name: Spisix 1
description:
Spizzy, the fox wakes up in an unknown place, trapped inside a ball. She needs your help to escape this prison, can you save her?

Controls:
- Interact and direct Spizzy by clicking/touching then releasing
- Arrow keys will move the Camera around the map
- Spacebar makes the Camera track Spizzy again
- Escape restarts the Dream as there are cases where it becomes impossible to finish.

Unlike the Prototype this is in a test version where you can pick the level and restart without losing lives.

Check https://discordapp.com/invite/hVuUUE2 to chat or report issues.
